Package javelin.controller.challenge

Class Difficulty

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.challenge.Difficulty
  • public class Difficulty
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes an Encounter Level difference. For example: an encounter is irrelevant if it's of -13 of lower.

        public static int get()
        2 chances of an easy encounter, 10 chances of a moderate encounter, 4 chances of a difficult encounter and 1 chance of an overwhelming encounter
